import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "../common/Header"; import Sidebar from "./Sidebar"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import NumberFormat from "react-number-format"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from "sweetalert"; import $ from "jquery"; export class UserDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { token: localStorage["appState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["appState"]).user.token : "", user: [], user_referrals: [], user_earnings: [], total_earnings: "" }; } componentDidMount() { this.getUser(); } getUser() { let id = window.location.href.split("/")[ window.location.href.split("/").length - 1 ]; axios .get(`${axios.defaults.baseURL}/user/${id}`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${this.state.token}`, }, }) .then((response) => { //console.log(response); return response; }) .then((json) => { if (json.data.success) { this.setState({ user: json.data.user[0], user_referrals: json.data.user_referrals, user_earnings: json.data.user_earnings, total_earnings: json.data.total_earnings, }); // } else alert("Cannot Fetch Data!"); } else swal("Oops!", "Cannot Fetch Data!", "error"); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(`An Error Occured! ${error}`); }); // alert(id) } makeAdmin(id) { axios({ method: 'get', url: `${axios.defaults.baseURL}/make-admin/${id}` }) .then((response) => { //console.log(response); return response; }) }; donePayment(id) { axios({ method: 'get', url: `${axios.defaults.baseURL}/done-ref-payment/${id}` }) .then((response) => { //console.log(response); return response; }); this.getUser(); }; render() { return (
Back to Users List

View User



{this.state.user.type == 1 ? ( Make User Admin ) : null }
Personal Details

Firstname: {this.state.user.fname}

Lastname: {this.state.user.lname}

Residential Address: {this.state.user.address}

Email: {this.state.user.email}

Telephone: {this.state.user.phone}

Date of Birth: {this.state.user.dob}

Marital Status: {this.state.user.mstatus}


Next of Kin

Fullname: {this.state.user.kfullname}

Address: {this.state.user.kaddress}

Email: {this.state.user.kemail}

Telephone: {this.state.user.kphone}

User Earnings
{this.state.isLoading ? (

Loading...

) : ( <> {this.state.user_earnings != "" ? (
{this.state.user_earnings.map((earning, index) => ( {earning.status == 1 ? : earning.status == 2 ? ( <> ): null} ))}
{earning.date} PaidPayment Requested
Total Earnings
) : (
User has no earnings yet.
)} )}
User Referrals
{this.state.isLoading ? (

Loading...

) : ( <> {this.state.user_referrals != "" ? (
{this.state.user_referrals.map((user, index) => ( ))}
{index+1} {user.fname} {user.lname} {user.email}
) : (
User has no referrals yet.
)} )}
); } } export default UserDetails;
